definition: to crowd in/to cram in/to force others aside/to press/to squeeze/to find (time in one's busy schedule)
to cash/to exchange/to add (liquid)/to blend/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing swamp/☱

sentences.english: I think motorists would take advantage of you.
Worse yet, bank runs can be contagious.
sentences.chinese: 更糟糕的是，銀行擠兌可以傳染。

definition: dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
to belittle/to scorn/to take sth lightly
to gesticulate/to point out/to point the finger of blame
to sow dissension (idiom); to drive a wedge between
to mix/to blend/(fig.) to spoil/to mess up things/to run around with (sb)/to get involved with/to mix (with other people)
(of a man) to dress as a woman (idiom)
to watch with amusement as sb makes a fool of himself
to send (sb) away/to change the subject/to open (an umbrella etc)
